segments.text: I can't believe the mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing from the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting all wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children are being sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't break any more rules or dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, looking so innocent and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman needs to turn off the faucet and pay attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so calm and tidy, unlike this chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the water damage to the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
